From Zscaler deployment to improved endpoint security, asset management, and Google Workspace FedRAMP-High configuration, I significantly raised the security and reliability of our internal systems. **3. Reducing Operational Friction Across the Company**
I proactively solved countless IT and security blockers everything from onboarding, access issues, and Google Drive cleanup to vendor management and internal processes.
